amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the International Trade Administration accounts by $277,824,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the International Trade Administration, Operations and Administration Account by $277,824,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 287 (Roll no. 204).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 287 (Roll no. 204).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. McClintock.
